text:
<@U02F2QPB4P8> There is one way to do this:
You can make your main serverless function an API endpoint function, this will make it so that you can call this function from anywhere including an app function.
Then just have your app function proxy the request to your Main api endpoint function.
this is pretty funny, yeah anyone that's been doing dev in HubSpot for a while knows about the weird /contact/ and then object type nomenclature, but apparently not everyone.

LOL, just this morning HubSpot decided to update the url structure.
<https://app.HubSpot.com/contacts/portalid/record/0-1/id>
Is the new way.
Ok they just reverted the change
